name: Descent: Dungeon In Some Cover
description:
Created for #HonestJam 2.
Thanks for asset pack by Kay: https://kaylousberg.itch.io/kaykit-dungeon
Animation and Character asset from Mixamo.
Key asset from Kenney.nl

A 3D Platfromer where you must find the key on each floor to descend deeper into the dungeon. Where have it's inhabitants gone!?
